ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Duo's
ygData.msgSnippet: Shaman or druid and monk or SK work well...any combo of the above....or any of those plus a mage or necro. I suspect wizard + pally could be formidable as
ygData.messageBody:
Shaman or druid and monk or SK work well...any combo of the above....or any
of those plus a mage or necro. I suspect wizard + pally could be formidable
as well, if the players were both good at their classes.
----- Original Message -----
From: hoggtyed <hoggtyed@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 02, 2003 8:10 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Duo's


> I was wondering everyones opinion on what 2 toons would make the best
